sentences.sContent: She had two miscarriages before she had her first child.
sentences.sCn: 她生第一个孩子之前流产了两次。

sentences.sContent: One in five pregnancies ends in miscarriage .
sentences.sCn: 有五分之一的妊娠以流产告终。

trans.tranOther: if a woman who is going to have a baby has a miscarriage, she gives birth before the baby is properly formed and it dies
